components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body:
We are seeing partial recovery and are scaling systems to handle the influx of traffic. Programmable Messaging and Programmable Voice are fully recovered. However we are still experiencing outages across multiple product lines due to an ongoing AWS incident( https://health.aws.amazon.com/health/status ) with their US1 Region. AWS has confirmed EC2 is impacted as well.

We have activated our incident response team and have all hands on deck working on remediation. We are partnering directly with AWS on the incident and have also escalated to their leadership. At this time we do not recommend trying to take any failover action to alternative Regions. We will provide another update in 60 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Legacy API]
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]
ZIPWHIP TOOLS - Zipwhip Provisioner Dashboard and API

incidents.name: Outbound Call Failure To a Subset Of Hungary Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner has informed us that the Hungarian regulator NMHH has begun enforcing Decree 4/2012 (I.24.), which introduces new screening and blocking obligations for calls terminating in Hungary via international interconnection points that present Hungarian Caller IDs.

To avoid disruptions in call delivery to Hungarian destinations, we recommend the following actions:

Recommended Steps:

- Avoid using Hungarian CLIs (+36 numbers) as Caller IDs on calls into Hungary unless you have a valid domestic interconnection or roaming agreement to justify their use.
- Where possible, use non-Hungarian CLIs, such as your main business number or an international service number.
You can quickly provision U.S. numbers (+1) in the Twilio Console and use those for calls to Hungarian recipients.
- Monitor your call completion rates to Hungarian destinations.

If you observe abnormal failure patterns, please reach out to Twilio Support for further assistance.

We’ll provide another update on 10/20/2025 at 12:00 PM PT or sooner as more information becomes available.

Our carrier partner has informed us that the Hungarian regulator NMHH has begun enforcing Decree 4/2012 (I.24.), which introduces new screening and blocking obligations for calls terminating in Hungary via international interconnection points that present Hungarian Caller IDs.

- Where possible, use non-Hungarian CLIs, such as your main business number or an international service number.
You can quickly provision U.S. numbers (+1) in the Twilio Console and use those for calls to Hungarian recipients.
- Monitor your call completion rates to Hungarian destinations.

If you observe abnormal failure patterns, please reach out to Twilio Support for further assistance.

We’ll provide another update on 10/20/2025 at 12:00 PM PT or sooner as more information becomes available.

You can quickly provision U.S. numbers (+1) in the Twilio Console and use those for calls to Hungarian recipients.
- Monitor your call completion rates to Hungarian destinations.

If you observe abnormal failure patterns, please reach out to Twilio Support for further assistance.

We’ll provide another update on 10/20/2025 at 12:00 PM PT or sooner as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe a subset of outbound call failures to Hungary phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe a subset of outbound call failures to Hungary phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe a subset of outbound call failures to Hungry phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing a subset of outbound call failures to Hungry phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with calls failing to Hungry. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Gazprombank Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Gazprombank Mobile network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 October 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 20 October 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Gazprombank Mobile Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon

incident_updates.body:
The MegaFon network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 20 October 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 22 October 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

20 October 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 20 October 2025 at 17:00 PDT
22 October 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 22 October 2025 at 17:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 October 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 20 October 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - Verizon

incident_updates.body: The Verizon network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 October 2025 at 21:00 PDT until 21 October 2025 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from Verizon United States handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 October 2025 at 23:00 PDT until 27 October 2025 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from United States handsets via subset of United States short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Australia and New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 October 2025 at 04:30 PDT until 27 October 2025 at 14:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays from and to Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 October 2025 at 23:00 PDT until 28 October 2025 at 03:00 PDT. scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in Australia and New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 October 2025 at 04:30 PDT until 20 October 2025 at 14:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be Intermittent delays from and to Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: India SMS Carrier Maintenance - Vodafone India

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

The Vodafone India network in India is conducting an emergency maintenance from 17 October 2025 at 11:30 PDT until 21 October 2025 at 11:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Vodafone India India handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
